#### **ISIMIP-PROCLIAS Cross-Sectoral Workshop**

The registration for the cross-sectoral ISIMIP and PROCLIAS workshop from **22 - 26 April 2024** is now open. Located at PIK in Potsdam and online everywhere.

Please register [here](https://eveeno.com/proclias+isimip2024) until **20.1.2023**.
